document.full_text: microsoft corp showed off a version of its next operating system at technology conferences in the united states and taipei, as some pc makers grumbled over restrictions on their involvement in the development of the system.
document.title: microsoft shows off windows 8 operating system
lines_and_colors: microsoft corp showed off a version of its next operating system at technology conferences in the united states and taipei, as some pc makers grumbled over restrictions on their involvement in the development of the system.
